documentType: prison roster or housing assignment log
summary: This document appears to be a series of prison housing assignment logs for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 9-10, 2019. It lists inmate names, identification numbers, cell assignments, and security notes. Most significantly, it shows Jeffrey Epstein's cell assignment (220L) and status (C/F - likely 'Confined' or similar) just days before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as inmate #76318-054 in cell 220L with status noted as (C/F), which is likely a custody or confinement designation.

events.title: Epstein's Incarceration at MCC
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is documented as an inmate in cell 220L at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (inferred from context and inmate numbering)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was housed in cell 220L at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) on August 9-10, 2019.
Epstein's inmate number was #76318-054 and his status was marked with (C/F), a common correctional designation.
The document is a detailed housing roster, listing dozens of other inmates by name, ID number, and cell assignment.
This log was created just days before Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
